title: Vedic Villa
description: Integration of retractable Pergolas into a traditional courtyard, blending heritage with modern climate control.

title: Skyline Terrace
description: A sophisticated rooftop lounge featuring custom-engineered tensile structures for year-round coastal dining.

title: Zen Garden Retreat
description: Minimalist glass-integrated awnings that disappear when not in use, preserving the garden's architectural lines.

title: The Azure Estate
description: Bespoke poolside gazebos designed to withstand extreme humidity while maintaining a boutique resort aesthetic.

title: Tech Park Pavilion
description: Large-scale automated shading for outdoor workspaces, improving energy efficiency for the entire block.

title: Mountain View Manor
description: Heavy-duty bioclimatic pergolas with integrated rain sensors, perfect for the intense monsoon seasons.
